intro: Antunesia angolensis, commonly known as the Angola antunesia, is a flowering plant native to Angola. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, fragrant flowers that are typically white or pale pink. It thrives in tropical and subtropical climates, often found in forested areas. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and ecologically significant species.
